item.title: Objects
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

You should have a void called

public void NewObjects()

If you have used -fedexer-'s Global Object Tut.
Under it just add

		AddObject(XCOORD, YCOORD, OBJECTID, DIRECTION, 10);//NAME FOR REFERENCE

Read full topic

item.title: Objects
item.dc:creator: @d_shadow7_0 d shadow7 0
item.description:
@d_shadow7_0 wrote:

ok in my /objects main/
this is wut i see

public void AddObject(int objectX, int objectY, int NewObjectID, int Face) { outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(60); outStream.writeByte(objectY - (mapRegionY * 8)); outStream.writeByteC(objectX - (mapRegionX * 8)); /*CREATE OBJECT*/ if (NewObjectID > -1) { outStream.writeByte(151); outStream.writeByteS(0); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(NewObjectID); outStream.writeByteA(Face); //0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH }
ok i dont wanana show any of the other parts to u but can soemone show me the layout on how to add objects!

Read full topic
